Emitra 9W Emergency bulb

Power backup - During power cuts, Energymitra Inverter bulb will provide light up to 4 hours continuously, therefore being a perfect power backup for your home. Fast-charging-With the automatic charging feature, Energymitra Inverter bulb will get automatically charged when it is kept ON, with the charging time of 8-10 hours
